meta.name: generator
meta.content: HTML Tidy for Windows (vers 14 June 2007), see www.w3.org

body.p: This page contains articles, tutorials, presentations and question and answers published on various Web sites on the Apache Axis2 engine. These references will prove to be a great help in boosting your knowledge on Axis2.

ul.li: Quicktstart Apache Axis2 - By Deepal Jayasinghe
Axis2 - The Future of Web Services- By Srinath Perera, Ajith Ranabahu
Introducing Axis2, the Next Generation of the Apache Web Service Stack- By Srinath Perera
Web Services Messaging with Apache Axis2: Concepts and Techniques- By Srinath Perera, Ajith Ranabahu (27 July 2005)
Axis2 Execution Framework- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Axis2 Deployment Model- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Understanding Axis2 Deployment Architecture- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Inside the Axis2 Code Generator- By Ajith Ranabahu (06 Feb 2006)
Utilizing a Non-Java Web Service with Axis2- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Avoiding Mistakes Made Using Axis2- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Migrating Apache Axis apps to Axis2 using Apache Geronimo- By Tyler Anderson (07 Mar 2006)
The Axis2 Transport Framework- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Reference Guide to Apache Axis2 Client API Parameters- By Eran Chinthaka (01 Aug 2006)
Axis2 - Performance Testing Round #1- By Devanum Sirinivas (17 May 2006)
Working With Apache Axis2- Deepal Jayasinghe (13 Sep 2006)
Writing an Apache Axis2 Service from Scratch- By Deepal Jayasinghe (20 June 2006)
Apache Axis2 Session Management- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Apache Axis2 with POJO's and Spring- By Ramanujam A. Rao
Six ways the Axis2 deployment model is more user friendly- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Invoking Web Services using Apache Axis2 - By Deepal Jayasinghe
Writing Your Own services.xml for Axis2 Web Services- By Deepal Jayasinghe
ADB Generated Code in Apache Axis2- By Amila Suriarachchi
Working with RPCServiceClient- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Embedding Apache Axis2 into Existing Applications- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Using Axis2 and Java for Asynchronous Web Service Invocation on the Client Side- By Deepal Jayasinghe
Java Web services, Part 2: Digging into Axis2: AXIOM - By Dennis Sosnoski (30 Nov 2006)
Java Web services, Part 3: Axis2 Data Binding - By Dennis Sosnoski (26 Jul 2007)
Introducing Axis2- By Eran Chinthaka, Chathura Herath (05 June 2006)
Accelerating Web Services Development with Axis2- By Deepal Jayasinghe, Ajith Ranabahu (05 June 2006)
Hello World with Apache Axis2- By Ruchith Fernando (29 May 2006)
How Apache Axis2 Finds the Operation and Service a Message is Destined To- By Eran Chinthaka(18 June 2006)
How to Debug a Web Service?- By Ajith Ranabahu (28 July 2006)
Why Axis2: The Future of Web Services- By Eran Chinthaka (05 June 2006)
Building Enterprise Applications with Axis2-Tutorial from ApacheCon Asia 2006- By Deepal Jayasinghe, Ruchith Fernando (30 Aug 2006)
Introducing Axis2- By Ajith Ranabahu (05 June 2006)
Setting up Apache Axis2 in eclipse IDE- By Ruchith Fernando (04 April 2006)
How do I Embed SimpleHTTPServer in My Application and Deploy a POJO?- By Davanum Sirinivas (09 May 2006)
How to Configure Axis2's HTTP Transport Sender at Client Side?- By Saminda Abeysinghe (11July 2006)
How to do REST invocation with Axis2/Java ServiceClient?- By Eran Chinthaka (17 June 2006)
How to Embed an Axis2 based Web Service in your Webapp?- By Davanum Sirinivas(17 May 2006)

li.a: Getting started with Axis2 and Sandesha2 to do WS-ReliableMessaging
